member.summary: This is the abstract class to be derived by GridElevationPlane, GridPlane, and GridRadialPlane.

member.summary: Public constructor for the GridPlane base class.

member.summary: Returns the boundaries of the given grid plane.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridPlaneBase.GetGridLine(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridPlaneBase)
member.summary: Returns a grid line which results from the intersection of the plane and the given grid plane base. The combinition could be either ElevationPlane and GridPlane or ElevationPlane and GridRadialPlane.
member.exception: The base plane object is null.

member.summary: Adds a child to the system.

member.summary: Sets the new orientation of the grid plane base coordinate system.
member.param: New X-axis to be set on the coordinate system.
New Y-axis to be set on the coordinate system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridPlaneBase.SetUserDefinedName(System.String)
member.summary:
Sets the name of an item. This implementation removes any existing relationship with a name rule, which in most cases is appropriate when giving an object a user-defined name.
This method must be overitten by classes for which this is not the appropriate behavior.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridPlaneBase.AddBoundary(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.ComplexString3d)
member.summary: Adds a boundary to the plane.

member.summary: Removes the boundary at specified index.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridPlaneBase.RemoveAllBoundaries
member.summary: Removes all boundaries on the plane.

member.summary: Gets the boundary at specified index.
member.param: Returns the boundary at index i.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridPlaneBase.SetBoundary(System.Int32,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.ComplexString3d)
member.summary:
Sets the boundary at specified index.
Note: This method is not adding a boundary, but replacing the boundary which is at index.

member.summary: List of nesting level enumerated types. Defines the nesting level for the planes.

member.summary: Default nesting level.

member.name: F:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType.Secondary
member.summary: Between two adjacent planes, a difference of only one level is allowed. Therefore, secondary planes are only allowed between two primary planes.

member.name: F:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType.Tertiary
member.summary: Tertiary planes are only allowed between two secondary planes.

member.name: F:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType.Any
member.summary: Any of the nesting level type.

member.name: F:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType.Same
member.summary: Same nesting level type.

member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder
member.summary: GridCylinder class implements certain interfaces and exposes its own properties and methods so that they can be modified.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.#ctor
member.summary: Internal use only --> Hidden default construtor for GridCylinder

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.#ctor(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.PrivateBusinessObject)
member.summary: Private business object wrapper constructor for GridCylinder.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.#ctor(System.Double,Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridAxis)
member.summary: Creates a GridCylinder object at the given position and the parent system. The parent system object must be an Axis object.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.CreateGridArcs(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridElevationPlane)
member.summary: Creates and returns a list of GridArc objects for the given cylinder and this elevation plane.
member.exception: Creating grid arcs by intersection failed.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.GetBoundaries(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.BusinessObject@,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.BusinessObject@)
member.summary: Returns the boundaries of the grid cylinder.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.GetGridArcsOnElvationPlane(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridElevationPlane)
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of GridArc objects resulting from the intersection of this radial cylinder. and the given elevation plane.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.GetReferenceGridCylinder(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.ReferenceType,Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType)
member.summary: Returns the reference object based on the reference type and the nesting level. The reference object will be a GridRadialCylinder corresponding to the given ReferenceType and NestingLevelType.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.AddSystemChild(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.ISystemChild)
member.summary: Adds a child to the system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.SetOrientation(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Vector,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Vector)
member.summary: Sets the new orientation of the grid cylinder.
member.param: New X-axis to be set on the coordinate system.
New Y-axis to be set on the coordinate system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.SetUserDefinedName(System.String)
member.summary:
Sets the name of an item. This implementation removes any existing relationship with a name rule, which in most cases is appropriate when giving an object a user-defined name.
This method must be overitten by classes for which this is not the appropriate behavior.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.Axis
member.summary: Gets the type of axis to which this radial cylinder belongs.
member.exception: Get the coordinate system of plane failure.
Get the axis object from coordinate system failure.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.GridArcs
member.summary: Gets a list of grid arcs on all the elevation planes belonging to this radial cylinder.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.NestingLevel
member.summary: Gets the nesting level of this radial cylinder.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position of this radial cylinder.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of radial cylinder.

member.summary: Gets the WBSItem parents for this item.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.SystemChildren
member.summary: Implementation of the SystemChildren property by getting a ReadOnlyCollection of ISystemChild objects.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.SystemParent
member.summary: Implementation of ISystemChild:System parent property. Uses the system helper of CommonMiddle.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridCylinder.Range
member.summary: Gets the range of the cylinder plane.

member.summary: Gets the X-axis of grid arc local coordinate system.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the arc.

member.summary: Gets or sets the grid arc matrix.

member.summary: GridRadialPlane class is derived from GridPlaneBase class. GridRadialPlane class implements certain interfaces and exposes its own properties and methods so that they can be modified.

member.summary: Internal use only --> Hidden default construtor for GridRadialPlane

member.summary: Private business object wrapper constructor for GridRadialPlane

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridRadialPlane.#ctor(System.Double,Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridAxis)
member.summary: Creates a RadialPlane object at the given position and with the parent system. The parent system object must be an Axis object of radial axis type.
member.param: Position of the radial grid plane.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridRadialPlane.CreateGridLine(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridElevationPlane)
member.summary: Creates and returns a GridLine object for the given elevation plane and this radial plane.
member.exception: Creating a grid line by intersection failure.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridRadialPlane.GetReferenceRadialPlane(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.ReferenceType,Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType)
member.summary: Returns the reference object based on the reference type and the nesting level. The reference object will be a GridRadialPlane corresponding to the given ReferenceType and NestingLevelType.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of plane of this radial plane.

member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridLine
member.summary: . GridLine class implements certain interfaces and exposes its own properties and methods. This class derives from Line3D. The methods on the interfaces of Line3d and Curve3D, which are not required by GridLine, are overridden and thrown NotImplementedException.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridLine.#ctor(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.PrivateBusinessObject)
member.summary: Private business object wrapper constructor for GridLine.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.GridLine.GetReferenceGridLine(Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.ReferenceType,Ingr.SP3D.Grids.Middle.NestingLevelType)
member.summary: Returns the reference object based on the reference type and the nesting level. The reference object will be a GridLine corresponding to the same elevation plane for the given ReferenceType and NestingLevelType.

member.summary: Returns the boundaries of this grid line.

member.summary: Adds a child to the system.

New Y-axis to be set on the coordinate system.

member.summary: Gets the grid elevation plane which is used to construct this grid arc. The position of the elevation of the grid arc can be obtained from the position of this elevation plane.

member.summary: Gets the intersecting plane used to construct this grid line. The intersecting plane can be either a grid plane or a grid radial plane.
